data.title: Elfun Trust Cuts Visa, Apple, Microsoft
data.text: David Carlson (Trades, Portfolio)'s Elfun Trust sold shares of the following stocks during the first quarter of 2020.

data.title: Africa Roundup: Visa connects to M-Pesa, Flutterwave enters e-commerce
data.text: It seems the demand for Safaricom’s M-Pesa payment product never eases. Since its 2007 launch in Kenya, the fintech app has commanded over 70% of the mobile money market in that country.
